nodes.text: The Vensor system was located in the Vensori sector, a part of the Trans-Hydian portion of the Mid Rim. The Veil of Skynara, a luxury yacht operating during the Galactic Civil War, was built in the system.

The Vensor system was first mentioned in Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim, a 1993 sourcebook written by Simon Smith and Eric S. Trautmann for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed it in grid square P-8.
